data.title: Three Crowns of the Sailor
data.meta_description:
Directed by Ra√∫l Ruiz | 117 mins | 1983
A callow student, scared stiff of the consequences of the murder he has just committed, allows himself to be dragged to a dance hall by a squiffed sailor who insists on making the shaken youth a captive audience to the recounting of his life story, a surreal trawl through ports of call and seedy brothels across Latin America.
